com.tome25.utils.lib

Class LibraryDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.lib.LibraryDownloader

  • public class LibraryDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can download files from web servers. You will need to copy this class and LibraryLoader into your project in order to add this library to the classpath if you want to download it at the start of your software.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage, java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'.
      LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage, java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage, java.io.File target, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'.
      LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage, java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage, java.io.File target, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'.
      LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage, java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'.
      LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a Jar file from the first valid of a list of URLs, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL.
      LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls, java.io.File target, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a Jar file from the first valid of a list of URLs.
      LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls, java.io.File target, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading from the first url of a list that is accepted by contentTypeCheck and responds without errors.
      LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading from the first url of a list that is accepted by contentTypeCheck and responds without errors, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL.
      LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a jar file from a single URL, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL.

      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a jar file from a single URL.
      LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url, java.io.File target, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading from a single URL if the content type of that web site is accepted by contentTypeCheck.
      LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url, java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck, boolean overrideTarget, boolean makeExecutable)
      Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a jar file from a single URL, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage,
                         java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'. This ignores lines starting with a '#'. If the file doesn't exists it creates it with defaultUrlStorage as its content. If defaultUrlStorage is null or empty it wont create a file, and therefore can't download anything. Valid content types are application/jar, application/java-archive, application/octet-stream, application/download and application/force-download.
        Parameters:
        urlStorage - the file to read the URLs from.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default content for urlStorage.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage,
                         java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage,
                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'. This ignores lines starting with a '#'. If the file doesn't exists it creates it with defaultUrlStorage as its content. If defaultUrlStorage is null or empty it wont create a file, and therefore can't download anything.
        Parameters:
        urlStorage - the file to read the URLs from.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default content for urlStorage.
        contentTypeCheck - a Predicate that checks the content type of the response from the URL.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage,
                         java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage,
                         java.io.File target,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'. This ignores lines starting with a '#'. If the file doesn't exists it creates it with defaultUrlStorage as its content. If defaultUrlStorage is null or empty it wont create a file, and therefore can't download anything. Valid content types are application/jar, application/java-archive, application/octet-stream, application/download and application/force-download.
        Parameters:
        urlStorage - the file to read the URLs from.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default content for urlStorage.
        target - the target location for the File. If it is a directory the download will get saved into that directory with the name it has on the server. If this is null the file will be saved into the libs directory next to this jar.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.io.File urlStorage,
                         java.lang.String defaultUrlStorage,
                         java.io.File target,
                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader that reads all URLs from urlStorage, and tries them until one is valid, as long as they are separated by a ',' or a ';'. This ignores lines starting with a '#'. If the file doesn't exists it creates it with defaultUrlStorage as its content. If defaultUrlStorage is null or empty it wont create a file, and therefore can't download anything.
        Parameters:
        urlStorage - the file to read the URLs from.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default content for urlStorage.
        target - the target location for the File. If it is a directory the download will get saved into that directory with the name it has on the server. If this is null the file will be saved into the libs directory next to this jar.
        contentTypeCheck - a Predicate that checks the content type of the response from the URL.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a jar file from a single URL, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL. Valid content types are application/jar, application/java-archive, application/octet-stream, application/download and application/force-download.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to download a file from.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url,
                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a jar file from a single URL, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to download a file from.
        contentTypeCheck - a Predicate that checks the content type of the response from the URL.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

        public LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url,
                         java.io.File target,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a jar file from a single URL.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to download a file from.
        target - the target location for the File. If it is a directory the download will get saved into that directory with the name it has on the server. If this is null the file will be saved into the libs directory next to this jar.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.net.URL url,
                         java.io.File target,
                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading from a single URL if the content type of that web site is accepted by contentTypeCheck.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to download a file from.
        target - the target location for the File. If it is a directory the download will get saved into that directory with the name it has on the server. If this is null the file will be saved into the libs directory next to this jar.
        contentTypeCheck - a Predicate that checks the content type of the response from the URL.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a Jar file from the first valid of a list of URLs, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL. Valid content types are application/jar, application/java-archive, application/octet-stream, application/download and application/force-download.
        Parameters:
        urls - the List of URLs to download a file from.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls,
                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading from the first url of a list that is accepted by contentTypeCheck and responds without errors, this will download the file into a directory named libs in the same directory where the file containing this class is, and give it the name of the file on from the URL.
        Parameters:
        urls - the List of URLs to download a file from.
        contentTypeCheck - a Predicate that checks the content type of the response from the URL.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls,
                         java.io.File target,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading a Jar file from the first valid of a list of URLs. Valid content types are application/jar, application/java-archive, application/octet-stream, application/download and application/force-download.
        Parameters:
        urls - the List of URLs to download a file from.
        target - the target location for the File. If it is a directory the download will get saved into that directory with the name it has on the server. If this is null the file will be saved into the libs directory next to this jar.
        overrideTarget - whether the target file should get overridden if it already exists.
        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • LibraryDownloader

        public LibraryDownloader(java.util.List<java.net.URL> urls,
                         java.io.File target,
                         java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.String> contentTypeCheck,
                         boolean overrideTarget,
                         boolean makeExecutable)
        Creates a new Library Downloader downloading from the first url of a list that is accepted by contentTypeCheck and responds without errors.
        Parameters:

        target - the target location for the File. If it is a directory the download will get saved into that directory with the name it has on the server. If this is null the file will be saved into the libs directory next to this jar.

        makeExecutable - whether the target file should get made executable.

      • downloadThis

        public static boolean downloadThis()
        Downloads ToMe25s-Java-Utilities from the first valid URL in the file ToMe25s-Java-Utilities-Download-Url.txt. The default for this file is the github download URL for ToMe25s-Java-Utilities.
        Returns:
        whether the download was successful.
